FactsService Documentation¶

This connector is used to access the facts-service api via python. For direct api documentation, please refer to https://facts.prod.ecorithm.com/.

Example Usage¶

from eco_connect import FactsService

facts_service = FactsService()

facts_service.get_facts(building_id=26,
                        start_date='2017-12-20 00:00',
                        end_date='2017-12-21 00:00')

Supported Methods¶

class eco_connect.FactsService(environment_name='prod', version='v1')¶

Supported Formats¶

  • Pandas DataFrame
  • List of Named tuples
  • Csv
  • Json (raw API response)
